original_text: So am I made to possess months of vanity, and wearisome nights are appointed to me.
korean_text: 이와 같이 내가 여러 달째 고통을 받으니 고달픈 밤이 내게 작정되었구나

sentences.original_text: So am I made to possess months of vanity
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 나는 헛된 달들을 소유하게 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: and wearisome nights are appointed to me
